resources.string:
As of today, it is believed that COVID-19 has passed to humans from bats. Did it happen directly, or through an intermediate the owner is not known for certain. 
 	 Incubation period of coronavirus: it is considered (!) That the incubation period lasts up to 14 days. 
 	 In research 1099 patients with a confirmed diagnosis average the incubation period for COVID-19 was four days Modeling in a study of 181 patients showed that 2.5% of cases, symptoms develop within 2.2 days. 
 and 97.5% cases within 11.5 days. Average incubation period in this study was 5.1 days.

\t To date, there is no complete understanding of the ways of transmission of infection. Initially, it was believed that the first infection occurred in the seafood market in Wuhan province. \n \t But, over time, the transmission path from person to person was confirmed. The main route of transmission of the coronavirus COVID-19 is contact. Sick or carrier sneezing and / or coughing, spreads mucus particles that contain the virus. Radius spread from a person within 2 meters. In this radius can happen direct infection. Outside this radius, infection occurs on contact with a contaminated surface. Healthy man touching the infected surface becomes contaminated with a virus, further, by touching to the face with his hands, he transfers the virus to the mucous membranes and infection occurs.

This project was carried out by students of Technopark 
 Android course 2021 spring 
 Nizovtsev Roman 
 Svetasheva Julia 
 Dragoon Ilya 
 We tried very hard!

We look forward to your feedback and suggestions! 
 I hope our application was useful for you. 
 You can get answers to interesting questions by this mail 
 tut_nichego_net@mail.ru

Fever in 99 percent of cases. 
 	 Weakness, fatigue in 70 percent of cases. 
 	 Dry cough in 59 percent of cases. 
 	 Loss of appetite in 40 percent of cases. 
 	 Muscle pain in 35 percent of cases. 
 	 Shortness of breath in 31 percent of cases. 
 	 Coughing up phlegm in 27 percent of cases. 
 	 Other less common symptoms include headache, sore throat, and rhinorrhea (nasal discharge). 
 	 In addition to respiratory symptoms, there are also gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea and diarrhea. 

	 As you can see, the most common symptom of coronavirus infection is fever. But it should be noted that the temperature level is also not indicative. So, out of 1,099 patients admitted to a hospital in Wuhan with COVID-19, temperatures above 37.5 degrees were observed in only 44% of patients.
